item.title: Children among 25 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine
item.description: Two blocks of flats were attacked in the western city of Ternopil. One was almost destroyed.

item.title: All 246 passengers rescued after ferry runs aground in South Korea
item.description: The vessel is stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: All 246 passengers rescued after ferry runs aground in South Korea
item.description: The vessel is stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.

item.title: Kenyan authorities paid trolls to threaten Gen Z protesters, Amnesty says
item.description: A widespread campaign sought to "silence and suppress" protesters, Amnesty International says.

item.title: Nicki Minaj supports contested Trump claim Christians being persecuted in Nigeria
item.description: The US-based Trinidadian rapper addressed the UN in New York alongside Trump administration officials, making claims that lack evidence.
